targets.query:
from(bucket: "crodeon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "crodeon")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power_supply_reporter_internal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "crodeon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "crodeon")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "atmos_pressure_reporter_internal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "crodeon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "crodeon")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "volumetric_water_content_soil_moisture_volumetric")
  |> distinct(column: "sensor_id")
  |> keep(columns: ["sensor_id"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({sensor: r.sensor_id}))
list.label: SensorIDs
list.name: sensor_id
list.query:
from(bucket: "crodeon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "crodeon")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "volumetric_water_content_soil_moisture_volumetric")
  |> distinct(column: "sensor_id")
  |> keep(columns: ["sensor_id"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({sensor: r.sensor_id}))
